If you're like me, and don't have a cable box in the room this TV will be in you'll be glad to know the tuner does bring in digital cable TV channels, including HD. Something I didn't mention in the video is the SD channels look nearly as good as the HD channels on this TV with aspect ratio set to 16:9. There is no difference really between 1080i and 720p broadcast channels that I could tell (likely due to the physical screen size).

Reviews.Title: Great picture, great sound, great value
Reviews.Author: P. Gaitens
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this TV from Amazon and I'm extremely satisfied.I'm not a video-nut or a gamer. Most of my viewing consists of sports, news, movies and some network and cable programs.And I'm an HDTV newbie. This LG LK330 replaced a 6-year-old Sony Wega, which was an excellent tube TV with a crisp picture and rich sound using DirecTV.Thus, the LG is my first step into the HDTV world, and my second LCD. We have a Vizio in the bedroom.Before buying the LG, I did considerable research, reading volumes of expert and user reviews on various sites and I compared specs and prices, eventually narrowing my search to the LG, Vizio and Panasonic. I went with the LG because, according to my amateur analysis, it offered the best combination of value and features.And when the Amazon price dropped I pulled the trigger.This TV was easy to setup. The instructions were clear and the remote took only a couple of minutes to master. I spent some time experimenting with the different video and audio settings to see and hear the differences and settled on the default standard settings.Right out of the box, the LG produced a good picture and sound with non-HD service while I waited a couple of days to get my DirecTV service converted to HD.With my new HD service, this LG really shines, and the 2-year-old Vizio in the bedroom is also a winner. While the color, definition and clarity on both sets are top-quality I have a slight preference for the LG, but this is totally subjective.I had read a few negative reviews about the sound, but my experience has been the opposite. The sound is distortion-free, exceptionally clear and the volume capability is more than I will ever use. Last night I watched a Tony Bennett performance and the sound quality was outstanding.Also, LG's Picture Wizard sensor and energy-saving option are worthwhile functions, producing a crystal-clear picture both in the dark and in a room filled with bright morning sunlight.This 32-inch LG is now our living room TV. While the room itself is large, the "TV" portion of the room has a seating  arrangement clustered around the TV, within a 7- to 8-foot distance of the screen and this works out perfectly.Overall, I'm quite happy with my new LG.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV!
Reviews.Author: $IDO@
Reviews.Content: TV was very easy to set up, sound quality is great and so is the picture quality. Definitely worth the $300 that I bought it for....

Reviews.Title: Love It, Love It!
Reviews.Author: Vivaldi
Reviews.Content: Last Christmas I received a 42" by another manufacturer, and I do enjoy it; however, this LG is a far superior product, plus it has the advantage of using it as a computer monitor, and the former product does not.I'm enjoying this in a bedroom, and it's a real pleasure; set-up was done by friends in no time 'flat,' and the sound, and adjustments are easy, plus there is a very helpful DVD to utilize that LG included - that is a critical advantage for me because I'm vision-impaired (yes, we do 'watch' TV) and they can be used via adaptive software on our computers.Thanks to LG for a great product, and to Amazon for it's great Prime shipping and packing! LG 32LK330 32-Inch 720p 60 Hz LCD HDTV

Reviews.Title: Great price, very good picture
Reviews.Author: Steele Brand "Rusty"
Reviews.Content: Excellent price from Amazon and delivered quickly at no charge and in fine shape (always a little concerned about purchasing such electronic products nonlocally).  Took a little while to find the right setup for the picture including having to trade out our cable box.  But after a week, very satisfied ... and just in time for the US Open where the tennis ball can be followed with no problem.

Reviews.Title: has the extras others dont
Reviews.Author: mark woodruff
Reviews.Content: I bought this to have hd in my bedroom.. and it has a great picture ..surprisingly was also decent as a computer monitor which I didnt expect being 720 p..but it works fine .with a little tweaking.... the built in qam tuner is awesome pulling DTV out of air with no cable easy to follow auto set up guides for channel scanning, sound menu, and  CALIBRATION( prob the reason alot of hdtv's dont look good you have to adjust the factory settings to your light environment pref etc) and the wizard EASY TO WORK is simple and CALIBRATES  perfectly!!Another extra you dont see on the cheaper  hd tv's this size is  an optical output....you can run a surround sound signal from the tv to digital speakers or an amp or reciever for external surround sound hd....it takes the digital sound from the hdmi cable input and allows you to send it on to your home surround amp..this is impt if your receiver is a little older and doesnt have hdmi in/out. I dont and it was simple to run the sound from the lg  to a digital( in this case optical),  in on my powered speakers...and great sound too...HAS PC SOUND IN (std headphone jack type for laptop sound input when using the blue pc ( vga) connector)..i use this as a computer mon and bedroom online hd  movie screen...works great...I know there are less expensive  32 inch tvs out there but the extras, ease of set up/calibration,  and the quality are in my opinion, worth the extra money

Reviews.Title: Nice quality TV.
Reviews.Author: Kimber45
Reviews.Content: Perfect tv for bedroom.  Easy to set up the stand.  Picture adjustment was easy with calibration instructions and is very clear in HD. Speakers are fine for bedroom and HDMI makes for clean setup.  So far a great tv for $300!

Reviews.Title: Great product at a great price
Reviews.Author: Dirt McGirt
Reviews.Content: I paid $300 for this TV after a good month and a half of researching televisions.- Incredibly easy setup right out of the box.- TV looks great, a very sleek black finish.- As far as TV speakers go, I'm pleased with the sound quality.- Picture looks awesome.  HDTV looks great, my Xbox 360 looks great on it and my Blu-Ray Player looks fantastic on it.  Having the 2 HDMI slots is really nice.- Remote works fine, no issues there.- The TV menus are very easy to work.The only issue I ran into was that a Vizio VSB200 soundbar does NOT work with this TV.  You can't change the sound output on the TV or something.  Very minor problem.Overall a great TV for a great price.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: 32" LG 32LK330 TV
Reviews.Author: razorduck
Reviews.Content: Have always wanted a LG because of ones I'd seen the last couple of years. So far , so good. Have only had a couple of months but picture and sound are good to me. I am not running HD on this particular set but image seems sharp. This set is in a bedroom but would be fine anywhere. I have a 55" Samsung in LR but will definitely consider LG when I upgrade again. Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: LG 32LK330 32-Inch 720p 60 Hz LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Dream41495 "***JEANIE***"
Reviews.Content: Lg LG 32-inch 32LK330 720p LCD HDTV (32LK330)  I purchased this TV on March 10, 2012, from Amazon.com, (it was delivered on the 15th. of March). It came in the original box, which did have some minor rips in it, but that didn't impact the inside of the box when we opened it, the protective wrapping was untouched, (no rips in it). My husband put the stand together and he said it was very easy to understand the instructions in the booklet on how to do it, we also received all the needed screws to put it together. Before we took our huge 25" old TV off the stand in the living room, we took the new LG to our bedroom and hooked it up to our antenna cable in there to see if it was going to work, (we don't have cable or satellite here, just a regular antenna).  We turned it on, went through the setup process, which for us was very simple and the TV did most of it by itself. When it got done scanning, we had channels on it, yes, the sound was low as read in earlier reviews, but also if you read all the reviews, some do tell you how to get that sound level up, which is going into the main, advance setup and adjusting the audio to the higher level, (also where you adjust your screen size, your clock, timer, child lock, etc). Since buying this and using it daily, we have not had any problems with this set at all!! It works great, the picture is very good, the sound once adjusted is good too, you don't have to turn it way up anymore once you make the initial setting in the advance setting area, (but we have noticed some channels do have lower volume then others), that is not the TV's fault though.  One of my biggest questions I had about the TV, (since we don't have anything but an antenna), was if we needed to use our digital box we had to purchase years ago, which was answered if you read all the reviews on, but the answer is no, you do not need the digital box to run this TV, it's made right into the set. It also picks up anything in the scan process that you might have hooked up to the set as well, such as cable and/or satellite, it even has a hook up for the computer, (which we have not used), but we have used the USB port to look at some pictures on the TV that I had downloaded into my flash drive, it read the flash drive as soon as I put it in.  The only thing I can comment on that I don't care much for is the remote control, the buttons are set pretty funny on there or it might just be me, but I'm always hitting the wrong button to try and mute the TV. Other then that, I have not found a thing wrong with it! I also went online to e-bay and found an extra remote for this TV so we both can have our own. I'm am very pleased with this TV we purchased, though some reviews weren't good, but we've had no problem out of ours. I would certainly recommend this set to anyone who is looking for a new digital TV.

Reviews.Title: So far so good with a few caveats
Reviews.Author: Bradford L. Geiger
Reviews.Content: Just got this so I will update as I live with it. My first impression is that this is a solid tv for the price. This is best for a bedroom or second TV. It is relatively no frills compared to more expensive products but for watching HDTV it works well so far. The picture is quite good and the tv adjusts brightness automatically based on the light in the room. That seems to work well. Sound is just OK but again, plenty good for a bedroom. It is lightweight and easy to move. So far the menu's are pretty easy to use and intuitive.Two notes about set up. 1.the cord is short and does not reach from my cabinet to the outlet next to it. Easy enough to fix with a power strip or extension cord, but kind of annoying and cheap. 2. the manual is printed in tiny print and the illustrations are so small that assembling the stand was a mystery.  It was almost impossible to tell which way the parts fit together and then into the tv. Two of the screw holes are almost impossible to see or reach with anything but a long screwdriver. I got it together more from guess work than from the instructions. Long term I think these frustrations will fade and I will mainly like a good looking TV.

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV / Monitor, Best Buy @ $266; Amazon is #1 for a reason
Reviews.Author: SunnySactoCA
Reviews.Content: After reading many reviews and considering price and features, this TV was a GREAT buy @ $266.  After putting the LK330 with three other good review TV's on my watch list, I waited for a month when Amazon ran a one day sale for $266 and I jumped on it.  With free shipping, no sales tax and a $40 credit card bonus, well, they came close to paying me to purchase.  I was a bit nervous about a few bad reviews, but even the very best TV's have negative reviews.  LK330 is a great set, nice clear picture, good sound, can't say anything bad, unless it burns out quickly.  Time will tell and I'll update review if I have an issue.  I use Lk330 for both computer monitor and free over the air TV programming.  Not needing a HDTV converter box saves me another $60.  Thank you LG for nice product & Amazon for awesome sale with extra discounts.

Reviews.Title: A Lot Of TV For The Money
Reviews.Author: edcaroleg "Ed & Carole G."
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a TV for our exercise room and we agonized over the brand and the features. The 32" size was one of the few things we had decided upon, based primarily upon the room size. We had previously purchased TVs with 1080p resolution for our living room and for our RV, so it was tempting to at least include the maximum resolution currently available.However, the price of the basic LG TV offered by Amazon was too tempting, so we ordered it in spite of its 720p resolution. What is surprising is how little difference there is between the LG and the other two sets when viewing a 1080i program source. (We really can't tell the difference.) All three are excellent! The LG's automatic picture adjustment feature works well and makes setup simple. (It worked as well as I was able to do do manually.)We have only had this TV for a few days, so we don't know about its reliability. If it proves to be reliable, it is a bargain.

Reviews.Title: LG 32 Inch LK330 Best Value Around
Reviews.Author: CJM
Reviews.Content: Pros(In order of importance to me):-From well-known company (won't go out of business and leave me hanging with a possibly defective TV)-Great value (comparable size and quality are as high as $450)-Great picture-Good sound (I know many reviews do not agree with me here but I haven't had any issues with it in my little living room)-Very aesthetically appealing, looks nice enough to not feel the need to hide it in an entertainment center.-Easy Set-up, took 10 minutes (most of my time was spent finding a screwdriver)-Clear TV Menus for changing video setting, sound, etc.-When switching inputs (DVD, Antenna, Xbox, etc.) It grays out the inputs that you aren't using and puts the ones you are using at the top of the list, great because I will rarely have all my inputs being used.-Lightweight, so it will be easy to mount if/when I want to mount it on a wall.Cons:-None yet, will update if I find any.

Reviews.Title: LG LCD TV
Reviews.Author: koga57
Reviews.Content: This is an outstanding buy at significantly less than $300.00.  The set-up was simple.  We are currently using this television as the 2nd T.V. hooked up to both the WII and satellite television.  Great picture, great sound and well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Still a good value
Reviews.Author: John Mullen
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my bedroom and I have it connected to a Logitech Revue to stream media from my server across the house and in tandem the devices suit their purposes. It was a little larger than I was expecting but still doesn't seem too large.The picture is very bright and pretty clear but not always free of occasional imaging artifacts eg. wavy lines or blocky-ness (although this could be due to the input device). Most of the media on my server is 480P-720P so I don't feel I've missed much by skipping on the 1080P TVs. The sound is mediocre and definitely lacks in frequency range but seems good enough for the bedroom.I'm happy that the set has more inputs and outputs than I will likely ever use. Built in programming makes fine tuning the color, contrast, etc very simple.  If I can get 5 years use out of this television it will have been a great value. If you're looking for a TV for your living room I'd look elsewhere but for a secondary set in this price range (<$300), this will be hard to trump at this time.

Reviews.Title: LG 32" LCD HD TV
Reviews.Author: Doc
Reviews.Content: Great TV. Outstanding picture, easy set up. Picture equal to my Sharp 1080 P HD TV. Will look to LG in the future for replacment TV's.  Very Prompt  Delivery

Reviews.Title: Its great
Reviews.Author: Dawnie
Reviews.Content: I had no issues with sound or picture. It was easy to setup. I just read the manual which explains a lot of the features. I am happy with this purchase. It has 3 hdmi inputs a usb and a hook up for your laptop or pc to use as a monitor. I really like the picture. I did visit this tv in the store to compare with others I found for the price and in the 32" family this was the best deal.

Reviews.Title: LG does a great job once again.
Reviews.Author: Glen Livit
Reviews.Content: Bought this for the kitchen and couldn't be happier.  For those purists that think they need 1080p for every TV in the house - think again.  Most cable companies only deliver 720p anyway so, unless you are going to connect this to a BluRay box or Full HD type appliance, there is no need to spend the extra $ on 1080p.  The picture is crisp, the colors true, and the remote is better than my other LG which is a couple of years old.  Great deal - you won't be sorry!

Reviews.Title: Best TV for Price ever!!!
Reviews.Author: Jordan, LA
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for $315; first off I was iffy on getting anything bigger than 26 inch. My girlfriend who wears the paints wanted a bigger screen, talked me into getting this one. It surprised me, one thing I really love is the sound quality, I love watching movies and though the speakers aren't visible they are heard, the sound is great, but it does require tuning through the menu. The video is amazing with HDMI, I hook up my Hp Dv6t with video and I'm impressed I wouldn't get any other TV I love this one. Best thing about the imputs when a device is plugged in and turned on, it will ask you if you would like to use that imput. Speakers do creak when used at high volume or when hooked up to the ps3 But only when the Volume is around 60-99. There is a picture wizard but no sound wizard.Pros: Great sound (for size), Easy to assemble, Good Picture Quality, Multiple ports, Large printed remote.Cons: Speakers Creak at loud Volume. Tricky menu, produces allot of heat.Well worth the price I promise

Reviews.Title: Stop working after 1 year
Reviews.Author: Lulu He
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV in September 2012, now only a little over 1 year, it stops working. I turned on the TV, no picture or sound, then it turns off automatically, never work again!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a media center
Reviews.Author: McE
Reviews.Content: I got this TV about 2 months ago and have been very impressed with it's quality.  The picture is outstanding, the sound great and I especially like having all the inputs.  I have hooked up a Windows 7 PC to this and am using it as a media center.  I have thrown all types of files through this and it continues to amaze me.  The only slight problem is running VOB files through the USB input on the TV - the video is not fully in sync, but that could be the thumb drives fault too.  I have hooked up a 2TB drive to this and have just about all my media moved to this and it preforms great.  It is also great at upscaling old VHS tapes to ~HD via RCA inputs. Works great with my Wii too.  I highly recommend this for what I'm using it for, but suggest you really check out all the features for your intended usage before purchasing.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Richard Baldwin
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for about a month now and I'm pretty pleased with it. I did a good bit of research and trusted the other reviews on Amazon and I'm not disappointed. This TV has good sound, a very nice picture and plenty of settings. The two very minor downsides are that the remote doesn't light up or have glow in the dark buttons. I think this is a small feature that should come with almost all TV remotes. The second drawback are the HDMI plugs on the back of the TV aren't a solid as I would like them. They flex into the TV whenever you put a cable in. Everything works fine but it just makes it feel a little cheap.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!!!!
Reviews.Author: eboxwilson
Reviews.Content: So I bought this TV for my computer and my xbox 360, I have it set up as a dual monitor and it works great! Amazing resolution and quality for the Price! If you plan to hook this TV up to your computer just make sure you have the right drivers, or the resolution gets blurry. :D

Reviews.Title: Crisp picture, great price.
Reviews.Author: Isaac S. Kohane "zakthehack"
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is superb. Lots of hardware interface options and a intuitive menu interface. The richness and clarity of the sound is adequate but not great.

Reviews.Title: LG 32inch HD TV
Reviews.Author: charles smith
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV. The sound, I have a little problem with but I have overcome it. I understand this is a problem with a lots of currents TV's on the market. Picture is bright and clear. It was easy to set up. I would recommend this TV to anyone looking for a great 32inch HDTV that will not put a dent in your budget.

Reviews.Title: does the job perfectly
Reviews.Author: khanTech
Reviews.Content: After reading the reviews and did some research i decided to buy this in LIKE NEW condition from amazon warehouse. came out just like a brand new tv with no scratches or blemish. fits perfectly for my bedroom. Picture quality came out clear and alive once i adjusted the settings. its a native 720p resolution which might not make u want to buy it but dont let the specs fool u. most TV broadcasts and videogame console only output 1920 x 720p unless you watch blue ray (which uses full 1920 x 1080p). i didnt have any problems with viewing angle. i only noticed a very small degrade in contrast when i moved more than 160 degrees. its not a big deal. i own a 55" LED Samsung and it does the same. bottom line is im satisfied with my purchase and i would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: HD Tuner is Great
Reviews.Author: 50 something
Reviews.Content: Wow.  I didn't know they made TV's that had built in HD receivers.  I don't have a DVR in every room and you don't need one for these TV's.  I liked this TV so much I bought two.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Noel "Noel"
Reviews.Content: After reading the reviews I was worried about the sound, but no problem whatsoever.  I agree with every positive thing that has been said!  This is such a great deal! Shows on Walmart.com for $399.99!

Reviews.Title: Just great
Reviews.Author: Martha B. Spencer "Bookish woman"
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this TV. Nice, sharp picture and the feature that adjusts it to the ambient light is great since there is glare from the window. The glare is no longer a problem.

Reviews.Title: Best TV ever!
Reviews.Author: L Khan
Reviews.Content: Really liked the product. This TV replaced my previous Samsung (smaller size) and I am super happy with LG. Crisp clear picture, good sound and superb features. Have hooked up my PC to it and it works great! I would highly recommend LG. It has everything you can ask for. Price is just right as well.

Reviews.Title: good bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Eugene A. Wathey
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with this replacement bedroom TV. Easy to set up and use.The value on line was better than Best Buy.

Reviews.Title: great little TV
Reviews.Author: sailor
Reviews.Content: Just bought a 32 in LG TV from Amazon. Fast shipping, perfect shape (same as usual) outstanding picture, easy hookup even for a electrically challenged octogenarian. Highly recommended, Ron in SW FL

Reviews.Title: MUCH BETTER THAN EXPECTED
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a replacement TV for my bedroom and wanted something that would look decent. After looking for several weeks and reading reviews I settled on this LG TV. It is a great TV...the picture and sound are far better than I had hoped for. I have a 55" LED for my main TV - I am not saying that it has the same quality picture as my LED but it is enjoyable to watch. Great colors and sound. For the price YOU CANNOT BEAT THIS TV.

Reviews.Title: Great bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: D. Daughtrey
Reviews.Content: TV has beautiful picture , very easy to set up. For under $300 and a name brand you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: LG 32 inch LED TV
Reviews.Author: TJK
Reviews.Content: This is the 2nd LG TV I have purchased in the last two years. The picture is crystal clear when in HD mode. It was a snap to install. I was a litte concerned about 720p aspect of the picture but the smaller screen size renders this concern moot. I have heard other concerns about the LCD screen and how long they  may last. I guess only time will tell what the deal is with that.

Reviews.Title: GREAT!!!
Reviews.Author: Shannon Mckenzie
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this TV after having a Sony that i had gotten from Walmart and had to return because it did not have enough inputs. So i got this one off amazon and right out of the box it was GREAT!! Picture is very clear and the sound is good enough for a room or dorm room(which i am in. it has enough inputs for me and the HD antenna is fairly strong compared to the Sony. I have to say i love this TV so far and would recommend it to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: El niño
Reviews.Content: TV is great. LG products are a great bargain and quality is worth every penny.  I have both and LG DVD and now theTV both were easy to install both work great.  Sounds is a little low but not a deal breaker by any means.

Reviews.Title: Good Product and great value !
Reviews.Author: Josh Fagin
Reviews.Content: We originally ordered a secondary 40" TV and it was just a bit too large for viewing in our master bedroom (14 x 14) so we returned it. This 32" size works perfect and seems much better made than the previous brand we returned. Attaching to stand and set up was very easy, sturdy stand sitting on our dresser and I love the glossy black frame. It arrived quickly via Amazon Prime's free 2 day shipping. It was the best value for it's size, I'd highly recommend.  The sound and picture quality get an A+ for the $.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: sha money
Reviews.Content: This is the first flat screen i have purchased and I love it! Easy set up very clear and loud sound picture is amazing as well i'd highly recommend you to buy this TV. Its labeled as 720p but it def looks like its a 1080p

Reviews.Title: Great 32' HDTV
Reviews.Author: MGF
Reviews.Content: I've owned a couple of 32" HDTVs by another manufacturer from the same region.  This HDTV has an excellent picture for a 720p model.  I think the on screen controls and remote is easier to use.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a Great price!
Reviews.Author: KLO "Ms Opinionated"
Reviews.Content: I originally bought a Haier 32" TV and had to send it back twice! I decided to buy this TV based on other customer reviews.It was a great choice. I love this set. It has great picture and sound quality. I would recommend this Television to anyone that wants a great buy for a smart price!

Reviews.Title: All Good
Reviews.Author: Renee
Reviews.Content: We're using this TV for the bedroom, so sound isn't an issue.  The colors are brilliant.  Set up was easy.  Took us a bit to find the virtual surround sound, but once we found it, it sounded great.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Peg B.
Reviews.Content: Purchased this tv in July for my bedroom - perfect size, beautiful picture and sound!  After a few weeks, however, lines began to appear on the screen....it wasn't too bad, especially if the screen ratio was set smaller.  Finally, I couldn't take it anymore and contacted LG, since the set was only a few months old.  Service people came out and took a look at it - turns out the screen is bad.  They took the info and ordered a new screen, which should arrive in a week or so.  I was advised that they will come back out and take care of that.  All in all, I couldn't be more pleased with the item itself, the ease of dealing with LG's claim area and the service people (shout out to RTA!) who came out to my home.  Job well done by all!

Reviews.Title: LG Life's GOOD ;)
Reviews.Author: Mekz
Reviews.Content: This tv provides a good color. There are all types of settings to chage the picture quality. The sound is good for a bedroom. I like to blast the music channels but its not very loud with this tv, but its fine for just watching tv, I usually have it on 34..nowhere near close to 100. I gave it 4. The stand could have been more sturdy..its very shaky, and it needs to be bolted down if you are not mounting the tv on a wall. It also gets .5 off for the sound. Other than that, this is a good lcd tv. Doesn't get hot,and it's outer look is sleek and charming. It's size and weight is an added bonus. I love it; its my first flat screen tv, and it won't be my last from LG. This is a good LCD TV for the price of only $309! Life's Good! ;)

Reviews.Title: Great entry level LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Ashish Jain
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this TV from amazon during black friday weekend. I am really enjoying this purchase.This is really good for the price and worth every penny spent. The automatic brightness adjustment with help of light sensor is totally useless feature which i turned off.This TV is a semi-HD at 720P which really doesn't matter much since most of the content we see is usually not full HD.Another good thing to consider is that it has 3 HDMI ports which is good if you plan to connect a lot of devices with TV. I usually connect my laptop using a HDMI cable to watch some videos from you tube and other websites.I would highly recommend this TV if you are OK with size (32 inches). Personally, i feel that i should have gone for at least 37" instead but still happy.

Reviews.Title: i love this tv!!!!!
Reviews.Author: GQ5
Reviews.Content: i bought this for $309 and got free shipping. the picture is vibrant and the sound is great. it adds a great presence to my room. i read the other reviews about the stand being unstable but mines is just fine. the essembly was pretty simple. over all i would recomend this to anyone. i plan to get a bigger one for my living room.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: lks   Indiana
Reviews.Content: I got my LG tv much sooner than I anticipated.  Once my son hooked me up to DISH I was so happy.  The picture is clear and I have no problem with the sound at all.  I am very pleased.  I would order it again.

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: ahamidre
Reviews.Content: It is a very good LCD for a small-medium living room. The only problem is about sound. It is not as good as expected and I think it is because speakers are at the bottom of LCD and toward the ground.

Reviews.Title: Great T.V
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I love this T.V! I have been using the t.v for about two months now and it works great and looks great too.  It was super easy to set up and I have had no problems yet. The picture quality is great and so is the sound. No complaints yet.

Reviews.Title: LG 32"
Reviews.Author: Stephen Klopp
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up had the 2 AV inputs that I need to hook both my cable box as well as my DVD recorder so I can record off the cable box and watch off the antenna at the same time.  Picture and sound are far better than the ProScan we had to replace after Costco gave us our money back when they could not get a speaker to replace the one that went bad in 1 1/2 years.  I wold definatley reccomend this unit.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: This is a great basic LCD HDTV.  I bought it for the price as an extra TV to put into an all-purpose room in our house.  I like that it has tons of connection options.  The remote control and features are easy to learn and use.  As with most flat screen TVs, the sound is average, but it's easy enough to connect it to an external audio system.

Reviews.Title: Great product, plus plays movies off USB too!
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these LGs a couple years ago for two bedrooms and it was a great price. Plus they play movies from the USB drive.  Pretty cool

Reviews.Title: Nice tv for the beadroom
Reviews.Author: Cassidy
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for my husband two years ago. It looks great and sounds great. Everyone loves watching movies in our room now.

Reviews.Title: Very good picture!
Reviews.Author: SJM
Reviews.Content: Super flat screen for the price!I've been very impressed with LG products so farExcellent priceOverall a very good value.

Reviews.Title: Mom likes it!
Reviews.Author: Cecilia
Reviews.Content: ...and I don't feel guilty i'm the only one with a LG Flat TV...It serves her purpose and being used as her bedroom TV!

Reviews.Title: Good TV For the Price
Reviews.Author: Luis Carlos Mendez
Reviews.Content: I got this TV more than a year ago and it's still going strong. I really, really love it. The option to change the screen brightness to save energy is a welcome edition and its got more than enough input connections on it for use with multiple HDMi and AV cables. There's also a USB port so it can be used with Google Chromecast as well as to view photos and whatnot on the TV.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: sternbul
Reviews.Content: It's a good TV for a bedroom (where we use it). The sound is better than a lot of the other 32" TV's and the picture is also good. I would recommend this to anyone. It really is a great TV.

Reviews.Title: Initially great - now 2 vertical lines
Reviews.Author: E S Atchley
Reviews.Content: Initially we loved this TV. Mostly the kids use it, but my wife and I do as well. After about 18 months (and six months passed the warranty), it developed two vertical lines about 1/3 of the distance from the right side. Changing aspect ratios does not change the line location, so I suspect an issue on the screen itself. I tried updating the software in hopes that it would fix it but it did not.We usually by Samsung, but Amazon had a good deal on the LG at the time. Oh well.

Reviews.Title: An Eminently Decent TV
Reviews.Author: Robert Denby
Reviews.Content: I have had this unit for over a year. It works, and the picture is good. It is what you would expect from a 720P. The sound is nothing spectacular but I have certainly heard worse. All in all, it is a very respectable unit.I do have a complaint in that the unit audibly heats up and cools down, by which I mean while it warms up (for the first 2 minutes or so) you will intermittently hear the case and/or inner components "popping" or "cracking" from heat expansion. Once it's up to running temperature everything is fine and there is no further noise. When you turn it off you get the same thing from the cooling. It seems like it is more of a nuisance than a real problem, however if any of this noise really is coming from internals then this unit will probably fail sooner as a result of all of the thermal expansion/contraction. I just don't know if that is the case or not. Only time will tell if this is a real problem, but by then it seems I will have probably gotten my money's worth out of it anyway.Maybe the newer units have fixed their heat sinks (or maybe not) so who knows what you'll get. For now, I have had zero dead pixels, zero problems with the lamps, and zero trouble with any of the inputs.I have a 47-inch LG TV downstairs that has been working like a dream for about three years now so I do lean toward LG in general, and performance-wise this smaller (budget) unit has held up just fine as well so far.

Reviews.Title: LG 32LK330
Reviews.Author: Thunderhed "darkhed"
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this TV.  For the price, it has great value for the money.  I look the look of the LG!

Reviews.Title: Terrible Quality!!
Reviews.Author: C. Widmer "stay at home dad"
Reviews.Content: From day one picture was only so-so. Sound was horrible.  Now 13 months in (warr. is 12 months) we now have 2 vertical lines in screen. I will never buy another LG product.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Miki
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my TV! It came on time and was packaged nicely! I have had no problems...the picture and sound are great! It fits perfectly in my living room. I was a little nervous because I've never ordered anything over $200 on Amazon...glad I did!

Reviews.Title: Pleased with my TV
Reviews.Author: David W. Batterson "David Batterson"
Reviews.Content: It's still working great. It was refurbished but was like new. It was also packed very well to protect it. Good instructions to attach the base.

Reviews.Title: 32" LG
Reviews.Author: Mark Ankney
Reviews.Content: Bought for work at Fire station and all the guys love it. Great picture and with HD receiver it's awesome

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Howdy
Reviews.Content: Great TV.  Easy to set up and it looks great.  I like this unit a lot.  I use it in my spare room for guests.

Reviews.Title: GOOD QUALITY TV
Reviews.Author: LINDA
Reviews.Content: WE USE THIS TV IN THE BEDROOM AND IT IS OF GOOD QUALITY.  PERFECT SIZE FOR THIS AREA.GOOD QUALITY PICTURE.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Briggs
Reviews.Content: Never had a problem with an LG TV yet and we own 4 of them. No comlaints on this one at all.

Reviews.Title: LG 32LK330 32-Inch 720p 60 Hz LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: wms
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter  last Christmas and she loves it. The shipping was fast. Package was in good shape when delivered and without incident. I had no prior experience with new TV's to compare this with so I have to rely on this product. It is a year later and still works fine with good graphics on the PS3.

Reviews.Title: piece of junk
Reviews.Author: lark jd
Reviews.Content: i bought this tv 9 months ago and the color is screwed up already...there's nothing like watching a football game where the best setting i can get for the grass is brown...getting player uniforms to the correct color is impossible...i tried every setting possible including resetting the tv to factory default and it's still broken...i tried contacting LG service and they ignored me...buy another brand

Reviews.Title: LG LK330 tv
Reviews.Author: B. J. Shulman "songwriter"
Reviews.Content: We really like our new TV. It's our first HDTV. Haven't done any custom settings; the presets seem fine for us. I haven't found anything I don't like about it. And the sound is plenty loud, especially on the "Cinema" setting.

Reviews.Title: Best TV yet under $300
Reviews.Author: Roy A. Porter
Reviews.Content: My wife and I got this TV as our first Christmas present to ourselves when we were married, and we love it. The first TV we got had a strange vertical line, but a simple email to Amazon, and we got a replacement that has functioned beautifully for about a year so far. I love the styling and picture quality, which while it is 720p 60hz, doesn't matter since we don't have a blu-ray player. It has enough A/V connections for our equipment, and the picture labeling of each input makes it handy when we have guests who come over; instead of labeling each input as simple DVD, BluRay, Game, etc, you can put a little icon for each, so Game has an XBox-esque controller, our Roku Box has an Apple TV/Cable box looking picture, and the DVD player is a silver disc. I would recommend this TV to anyone.

Reviews.Title: good tv, but not a 5-star tv
Reviews.Author: shoe
Reviews.Content: I like this tv very much. My only complaint is that the buttons on the side of the tv don't do what they're supposed to do. For example, pushing the power button changes the channel. It's slightly annoying. Other than that, I've had this tv for 6 months and I like it very much.

Reviews.Title: Happy with the purchase.
Reviews.Author: Normand J. Lemenager "Norm L"
Reviews.Content: Needed a TV for the den so my grandson can watch his movies and play his video games. Good product: clear and highly defined picture with excellent color quality.  no complaints. this product provided me with what I needed. a good quality picture and sound for my grandson's TV use.

Reviews.Title: Cool tv
Reviews.Author: Oliver Lugo
Reviews.Content: I'm really happy with my purchase, my LG TV is just like they describe it (like new)... a good image, great sound. I can't say nothing bad about it, the 32 inches' tv is ideal for a room like mine... my best purchase in Amazon till now

Reviews.Title: new TV
Reviews.Author: hollygreen
Reviews.Content: We wanted a new TV for the bedroom. This one is perfect. Delivered right on time. Came very well wrapped - no damages during shipping. Very easy to install. It is unobtrusive, particularly when compared with old tube style set. Could not perform better, sharp image, good sound.

Reviews.Title: LG 32LK330 LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Pat S. Krummel
Reviews.Content: Our new LG 32LK330 arrived 2 days ahead of the date on which amazon.com told us.  It was very easy to install and works perfectly.  The picture set-up was very straight-forward and easy.  So far it's a great addition to our TV "fleet."

Reviews.Title: LG is my brand now !!
Reviews.Author: Jwalsh62
Reviews.Content: After purchasing a 42" LG Plasma for the master bedroom LG got me hooked so when it came time to purchase my son a new TV for his room I knew exactly where to go. LGs on Amazon. Well we are not dissapointed. Received a great price on a great product. We are very pleased with the picture and sound quality on this set. Would recommend to others in a heart beat.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a small area or bedroom 32"
Reviews.Author: Big Dawg "Big Dawg"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my mom, if 32" is what you need, I would recommend this. I am a believer that 37" and below TV do not need a 120hz display or 1080p this 32" performs well, excellent quality pictures and the sound is good. The channel surfing options is also good, I can set the channels to only show digital channels which is good for my mom as she would get confused with all the digital channel from Comcast (no cable box).

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: AVR
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV about 1 month ago and I LOVE it. Great value and great quality. No complaints and I didn't have to lug it from the store to my car and home.  This is my 2nd TV purchased from amazon.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: The product was better then expected.  Would never know it was not new out of the box.  Have been very happy with performance.  Wouldn't hesitate to recommend this model to my best friend.

Reviews.Title: Just right
Reviews.Author: MeanMrMustard
Reviews.Content: I needed a 32" TV to fit in a spot between two book cases. After a lot of research, I decided on the LG and am glad that I did. The picture is good and the sound is serviceable. I have not used the USB features yet, but they look interesting. The remote is well laid out and the assembly was easy.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I got this tv more than one month now. Everything works out great at a decent price. Before I got it, I did some research online learning what is really important for a tv. And I found this tv happened to have everything I wanted. I use it for Xbox, as a monitor for my laptop just for a bigger screen. You can just plug in a flash drive And watch movie in it. Hopefully it can last for a long time. In that case it will be a perfect deal. All being said, you have to consider what you can get at this low price. I wish I can put more technical details on what I have learned,  but I write this thread on my iPhone. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Get it get it, recommend it by ME
Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: I love my new generation TV, this product is excellent, now i know what is watching LCD TV, the image quality is excellent, the digital menu and panel works nice and easy, the LG product is one of the best in the market, and the best is the price, other LCD TVs are more expensive, but this is the same quality and better price, a la comunidad latina lo recomiendo, hice que me llegara hasta Venezuela y está totalmente nuevo, ya puse mi televisor con caparazón en el otro cuarto, el LCD es hermoso y si el precio les conviene no tengan miedo en comprarlo, es de buena calidad y nuevo de paquete.

Reviews.Title: LG 32LK330 32-Inch 720p 60 Hz LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Melvin Earl Tavis III "Mel"
Reviews.Content: My 32inch LG HDTV looks great in my room. The audio/picture quality looks amazing and should satisfied everyones HD needs. It has 3 HDM1 ports, AV1 ports, USB plug in, plus more that u tech boys could get into. My dad has a 42inch in his room and it doesnt even compare to my LG HDTV. This tv surpassed all my needs and more. I couldnt be more in love and satisfied with this tv. I highly recommend this for anyone whos looking for a great tv for their room/living room. 5 STARS

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Peter S. Erickson "Peter"
Reviews.Content: Great TV, Great Price, Great Picture...I use this televisino outside, so I like the ability to switch the "energy mode"... making it very efficent (low brightness at night), and turning off energy mode (max brightness) if watching TV during the day.  Overall, very impressed.  For regular TV watching 1080p is over rated (especially at this size TV!).  The image looks great at 720p.

Reviews.Title: GR8 product
Reviews.Author: Stumper100 "ROB"
Reviews.Content: I love this product and cant say anything bad about it. It was delivered on time , it worked as advertised and like I said b4 I love it.

Reviews.Title: Great Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: GrowingReal
Reviews.Content: Got this basic TV for the bedroom and it suits my needs.  It is extremely easy to set up only need a screwdriver and your good to go.  Picture quality is great and the menu is simple and intuitive.  Amazon shipped it quickly and safely.

Reviews.Title: Nice value, had 1 dead pixel and bleeding
Reviews.Author: Doy
Reviews.Content: I really like the TV for the price.  I got it for $330.After setting it up, 40 days after receiving, I saw that it had a dead pixel, and the edges had bleeding(extra light on black screen).Amazon was nice enough to offer exchange or return, but I decided just to keep it.The stand is kind of annoying to put together, but that is expected for a 40 inch at this price.  It is a stationary stand.Overall I like it.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: TAY
Reviews.Content: This was put in my sitting room and its perfect....not too big, nor too small.  its the perfect size for the space in which its being used.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT BUY ON A 32" LG  LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Johnny L. Coleman "Johnny  Coleman"
Reviews.Content: GREAT ITEM AND A VERY GREAT DEAL THROUGH AMAZON.  I HAVE A 47" LG LCD TV AND DECIDED A 32" LCD TV WOULD BE AN EXCELLENT CHOICE FOR MY GRANDDAUGHTER'S BEDROOM. I LOVED THE 47" LG LCD TV, SO, I DECIDED THAT THE LG LCD WOULD BE AN EXCELLENT CHOICE SINCE I LOVED THE OTHER ONE.  BOY, WAS I CORRECT!  I LOVE THIS TV AND WOULD PURCHASE IT AGAIN AND AGAIN.  THE PRICE THROUGH AMAZON WAS $297.00 WHICH WAS WITHIN MY PRICE RANGE.  LOVE IT, LOVE IT, LOVE IT!

Reviews.Title: GREAT TELEVISION THAT SATISFIES MANY VISIONS
Reviews.Author: QUALIFIER
Reviews.Content: To begin the LG 32LK330 came with excellent instructions and the CD ROM added quite a bit of insight to the greater awareness of all the functions of the LCD television set.This is a great entertainment medium with the picture on the set being crystal clear with quite vibrant colors and the sound built into the set is adequate also for full enjoyment of any particular channel. There are different choices for the sound and picture which makes this an outstanding value. You can always add an additional sound system to the set for even more heightened enjoyment.This LCD TV was bought for our living room which is perfect size for this and the distance 9 feet from our sofa is ideal for a 32 inch set. In the other room we have a laptop LCD computer that is 15 inches plus which satisfies our needs for the bedroom.The LG 32LK330 cosmetically is great looking when installed on the wall. The set has satisfied both of us for the time we have taken to utilize fully most of the functions with the cable company and the LCD television itself. This set I would highly recommend with the exception of using it for games as it is not advised since it is 720p instead of 1080p. The LG 32LK330 finally was a great economic value which invariably supports the final reason to make this a great addition to any home.

Reviews.Title: Recommended Economical TV
Reviews.Author: G. Koelsch "Bartlet for President"
Reviews.Content: The LG 32LK330 32-Inch 720p 60 Hz LCD HDTV came earlier than predicted and in good condition. It setup easily and went from box to working in less than 1 hr. I have been very pleased with the performance of this product and recommend it to those seeking an economical TV to fit in a limited space environment.

Reviews.Title: good value for the buck!!
Reviews.Author: missouri_mule
Reviews.Content: found this to be an excellent bedroom tv priced right and great picture! no complaints here not as good a pic as my 46" toshiba, but more than adequate for an xira tv for the bedroom

Reviews.Title: Very happy, better than expected!
Reviews.Author: E. Meiners "pawnslinger"
Reviews.Content: It took us a little while to figure out how to attach the stand.  But once that was done, everything else went very smooth.  Picture, sound, connection options, all exceed my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Happy customer!
Reviews.Author: Flo nightengale
Reviews.Content: Absolutely as advertised.  Easy to set up and program. Excellent picture and good sound quality, especially for the size. I am very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: CommonSense
Reviews.Content: No complaints whatsoever about this TV. Excellent picture quality and sound. I own another LG TV (47") and was extremely pleased with it so I bought another LG TV. My 47" is three years old and is a 1080p/120hz and this TV has just as good picture quality as my larger one.

Reviews.Title: Great TV With Awesome Image Quality
Reviews.Author: Sinner
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my girlfriend's birthday, and I am perfectly satisfied with it.It's really simple to use. As soon as I switched it on, it scanned automatically all available channels. I then had access to a list of the channels, I could bookmark the favorite ones etc.We watched a few movies in 1080p quality, and the image quality is just perfect. I also tried the HDMI connection with my laptop and the TV, and it was very simple and intuitive. Here again, the image transferred perfectly from the laptop to the TV, with an excellent quality of image and sound.You can also plug your USB drive directly on the TV and search for movies, pictures, etc. and play them on the TV.The only problem of this TV is that it doesn't support the DTS sound format. Hence the use of the HDMI cable to be able to play the movie on the laptop and watch it on the TV. Other than that, it's an excellent product.

Reviews.Title: quality
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: This tv is sleek and modern the color is outstanding  and the picture fills the entire screen. I am thrilled

Reviews.Title: Tremendous Bargain !!!
Reviews.Author: Mr. Bob
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd LG flat screen, I also have 2 26" models.  In my studies I find that the picture is fairly equal in all brands.  What is so superior about LG is the SOUND SYSTEM, way above their competitors.  The $296 price was $100 less than I was expecting to Pay !!!  Easy set-up and well packaged for shipping.

Reviews.Title: LG Flatscreen TV
Reviews.Author: bjfaith
Reviews.Content: A great TV for the price.  Really has a good picture and light weight.  Really pleased with this purchase.  As I replace my TV's they will all be LG

Reviews.Title: Real nice
Reviews.Author: Jordan1986jw
Reviews.Content: Great price, great tv so far.  One of the best products that I've purchased in a long time.  Can't get over the product for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: CRF_911
Reviews.Content: I shopped for several days online for a TV for my bedroom before picking this one. My main reason for picking the LG brand is that I have a larger version in my livingroom and I love it. This TV is such a bargain at the price I paid for it.  Also, I ordered it on a Friday night and it was here on Monday afternoon.  We set it up that same night with ease and it works beautifully.  Great picture quality and the sound is perfect for the bedroom.  Extremely happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV --- Highly Recommended
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a reasonably sized and priced TV for our apartment, and this 32 inch LG is perfect.  The picture quality is great, for both HD broadcasts and it even plays the basic cable channels well.  I highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Good little TV
Reviews.Author: J. Schurk
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my parents for Christmas gift. For someone that just wants a cheap little TV with no bells and whistles this fits the bill. It went into a smaller narrow room, wall mounted about 4 to 4 1/2 feet away from the viewer and it's perfect for that space. No technical issues out of the box and my father said that the set up process was very easy for him (He is NOT a tech guy).

Reviews.Title: LG 32LK330
Reviews.Author: Chaton
Reviews.Content: This is the 2nd one of these TVs I've purchased because I liked the first one so much. I'm a pretty simple TV watcher but I feel the sound and picture on this TV are excellent. Set up was a snap and navigation through the menus is very simple. If don't have a problem with the picture showing pixels or odd lines at all. The only problem I have is when I try to watch something on my laptop through the TV the sound is too low to hear, however that may be a problem with the latptop and not the TV. I just turn up the volume on the laptop and unhook the audio connection of the AVG and it's fine. I don't know if it would satisfy someone that needs to fanciest 3D/HD/surround sound but it was a perfect fit for my needs.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Active Media
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv last week so i havent seen all the tv has to offer yet but so far it has been great!!! Nice and perfect image, very light and thin and many ports to connect whatever you want! Although i would have expected more of the sound but since the tv is for my bedroom i think is perfectly more than enough! Totally recommend this tv

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Racerrex
Reviews.Content: This TV is perfect.  Excellent color and sound and for only $280.  I first purchased an off brand for $230 and it was horrible so I returned it and paid a little extra to get this one.  I'm glad I did because the quality of this one is night and day compared to the cheap one.  I love it.  You get what you pay for...

Reviews.Title: Great picture and sound for the price!
Reviews.Author: ThuHuynh
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mother-in-law's bedroom for xmas. Great picture and sound for the price. Would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Well Pleaseed
Reviews.Author: swr4pink "swr4pink"
Reviews.Content: Much clearer picture than my Mother's older flat screen and, althouh it is large, the overall set is very slim and attractive.

Reviews.Title: Great product, great price!
Reviews.Author: nicksmommy27
Reviews.Content: This TV is gorgeous!!  I love the sleek design and the great picture.  My husband is VERY picky and was sold on it within the first few days of watching it.

Reviews.Title: Great quality for price
Reviews.Author: NOLA "mike"
Reviews.Content: Bought this after returning a comprably priced Sharp.  Similar price, worlds difference.  I also have a Samsung as our main TV.  This LG is not as nice, but at 1/3 the price, it is close enough to warrant 5 stars.  Picture quality is excellent.  Is there better quality out there?  Yes, but at this price point, I'm not sure.  Sound is good, but admittedly that is not a high priority.  Overall a very nice TV, and an outstanding bargain when on sale (I got for 299).

Reviews.Title: LG Quality
Reviews.Author: Luckie
Reviews.Content: Alot of research and alot of "no name" tvs out there. I am very pleased with the sound and picture of this LG. Easy set up. Pay the extra $30 or so and get a brand name like LG.

Reviews.Title: LG 32 inch LCD TV - VERY HAPPY!
Reviews.Author: Alice L. Durbin
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for a Christmas present for my son.  It arrived in 2 days and set up was extremely easy.  The picture had a red line through it....contacted Amazon right away.  The next day UPS picked it up with a pre-paid label, and the replacement arrived the very next day.  Very quick handling and replacement.  Don't be afraid to order from Amazon if you are worried about returns/damage claims...they are the BEST!  The replacement TV is perfect, and my son is thrilled with the quality of the picture and performance of this TV.  Very happy customer!!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV Highy recommend
Reviews.Author: Regan Burke
Reviews.Content: This TV was delivered much faster than I expected.  I am not very adept at electronics so I was going to have someone else install it.  However, by the time I opened it, read the instructions (REAL easy) and unpacked it, I realized there was not much left to do but plug it in!  The picture is good, sound good and I get all the channels

Reviews.Title: Great birthday gift and an even better price!
Reviews.Author: Pamela Williams
Reviews.Content: The television was a gift for my 16-year old son.  He absolutely loves it!  It even came one day earlier than expected.  I would love to get another bargain like this one.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: shaun
Reviews.Content: Just got it today, and so far very pleased, great picture, sound is fine, easy set up. I brought a similar Vizio Led, and took it back the next day to exchange for the LG 32" Lcd and find it to be much much better.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, great price
Reviews.Author: S. Watkins "swatkins01"
Reviews.Content: I originally bought this TV because of the great price for the brand. Not only is it reasonably priced, but the picture is great - crysta clear and vivid. HD channels look especially good. Quality is similar to TVs I have seen in showrooms costing $100 more.

Reviews.Title: Bang for your buck
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Lg products have never failed me and so far this product has met all my expectations. Unlike most flatscreen tvs this one doesnt sermm to over heat and the picture quality and sound is phenomenal. would recommend this product and the shipping time was spot on.LG 32LK330 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LCD HDTV

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Mersid
Reviews.Content: people this is it this tv is the best so far i had it for 20 days and works perfect

Reviews.Title: Great price, great shipping, easy set up....
Reviews.Author: brithefireguy
Reviews.Content: We needed to replace an older Sharp tv for our bedroom that was ruined because of a power surge.  We did a lot of research before deciding on this LG model. The price was great and the reviews all seemed to say this would be a good choice.  Set up was super easy.  We had to use the included stand until we have time to mount it on the swivel wall mount we purchased with it.  It does seem a bit unstable on the stand.  Way more wobbly than our other flat screen.  We're not what you would call tv snobs but we know and appreciate a good picture quality when we see one.  We have a Samsung 40" 1080p LCD in our living room that has an amazing picture.  Before ordering this LG we went to BestBuy and checked out the picture quality there.  It seemed really good.  I'm not sure if they hook up the televisions there differently then we did at home but there is a drastic difference in quality.  I know 720p isn't going to be as good as 1080p but from all the reviews we read that shouldn't matter unless you are watching true HD signals.  is this not true?  The color on this LG is amazing.  Switching between different options is super fast and easy.  But on most channels the picture seems distorted and slightly stretched.  we tried all the different ratios and it didn't help.  We will call LG to see if there is something we can do to make it better but we might be sending it back.  Oh and bty, connection was through RCA cables, not HDMI.  Our cable box in the bedroom doesn't support HDMI.LG 32LK330 32-Inch 720p 60 Hz LCD HDTVAbove was our original review.  Since then we have experimented using a HD cable box that had HDMI outputs and that made a huge difference.  The "standard" cable box from Directv doesn't offer an HDMI output and is non-HD so we have ordered one so we can take full advantage of the tv. We have also since mounted to the wall mount and wow, what a huge difference that made.  We love being able to angle and swivel the tv to any preference we like.  It's also nice to swing it completely out of he way when not in use.  I originally rated 3 stars but will be updating to 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: lg hd tv
Reviews.Author: Linda Bondy "Linda b"
Reviews.Content: I am amazed at this tv. I had been looking for a long time and wanted  an LG. The picture is so clear, and color is bright and true.  i can use one remote for even my dvd & the LG,  I live in an apartment and the stand is a swivel.  I can watch it in the living room or my dining room. Very easy to use and I just love the tv  the picture the color everything

Reviews.Title: LG 32" TV
Reviews.Author: Googlymonster
Reviews.Content: So I bought a refurbished 32" LG TV for $260 shipped. Its been working great so far. The only thing is that the screen did some weird things last week. The back-lighting went crazy out of control, It changed from bright to dim and dim to bright when I was using it. It has only done this once, and I'm starting to think I simply had the remote under something. However, I"m not sure of this so I'm biding my time hoping it is nothing major.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY ANY LG TV
Reviews.Author: mjct
Reviews.Content: 32LK330. Pwr cord at back of Tv burned and melted, only 7 mos old. LG warranty valid but they could care less. Seriously defective product.

Reviews.Title: Good size for the bedroom
Reviews.Author: Tim Wilson
Reviews.Content: My wife and I purchased this to finally replace her 20 year old 19" tv in the bedroom. We love the size and the clarity and the ease of setup on this. I had it put together and installed in less than 20 minutes.

Reviews.Title: Wow, its great !
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: The setup was very easy and it did well out of the box. Once we upgraded our Dishnetwork setup to HD and hooked it up, the picture quality both in HD and SD seems excellent.

Reviews.Title: Love my LG
Reviews.Author: S. Brown
Reviews.Content: Received my LG 32" on Jan 6, set up was easy and picture is clear. Perfect for my living room. This is my first LG product and I would definitely buy another LG brand. Excellent for my daughter gaming system. Price versus product is excellent. Couldn't ask for anything more

Reviews.Title: LG 32-inch tv
Reviews.Author: R. popella
Reviews.Content: Are tv went black about 8 month ago, so I started researching tv.  ON Consermers report website the tv was rated good.  SO for the good reviews and the great price we bought it.  I have been very happy with this tv. I am not a tech wis so I am not so sure about all the details but I am happy with the picture and volume.  I turn it on in the morning and it starts up great and gives us no problems so I would say it was a great buy. Are last tv only lasted 7 months so I was nervous about that happening again but I have not been let down yet.

Reviews.Title: LG 32" LK330
Reviews.Author: al32931
Reviews.Content: I am happy with the picture, and set up was easy.Purchased as for my bedroom,and serves the purpose well

Reviews.Title: what an incredible deal
Reviews.Author: JG
Reviews.Content: Exact replica at BB for 2X as much! Arrived safely and secure. Couldn't have asked for a better deal or better service.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: j-boogie
Reviews.Content: I really love this tv so far.  The sound is actually pretty weak for a tv this size, BUT I've got it hooked up to a sound system anyway, so it's not a REAL issue.  Other than that, I have no complaints so far.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: nmp
Reviews.Content: Great product! I would highly recommend this to others looking for a similar item.  Item was exactly as described in the product info portion of the listing!

Reviews.Title: Not quite as expected
Reviews.Author: Robert Osborn
Reviews.Content: Some quality issues with picture size and brightness and contrast.  Cable shows seem to be compressed. Maybe because it's non-HD and 720.  HD 1080 cable is OK.  Brightness and contrast seem to be below par if adjusted.  Otherwise, nice unit.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Mason King
Reviews.Content: I was able to pay for this TV with Amazon points that I get from doing surveys. Everything about this TV is top notch! The picture is excellent and so is the sound! The size of the picture is just right!

Reviews.Title: customer
Reviews.Author: Kamilla McNeill
Reviews.Content: This is a great product and a must buy. I like it alot. It is great!I would recommend this to a friend.

Reviews.Title: family
Reviews.Author: yancey
Reviews.Content: my new tv is so awsome my kids love my wife loves it and i really do and i really like the way it auto adjust to the light

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Mohammad
Reviews.Content: Nice picture love watching this tv pixels are very  sharp very clear I also have sony bravia 1080p but is almost like that so good

Reviews.Title: Did Not Meet Expectations (see my follow up comment, review edited)
Reviews.Author: quicksand
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research and was really looking forward to receiving my quality LG 32LK330.  When it arrived I assembled the base and tv and plugged it in.  The picture was pretty washed out and blotchy.  I worked with the menu items and improved the picture somewhat but could never get rid of the pixalated edges.  It showed up mostly on the parts of the images that were at an angle, like a person's collar or between a commentators jacket and shirt.  It looked like hundreds of little stair steps instead of a straight edge.  Also, there was a ghost image (4 layers deep) to the right of the image. It most notably showed up when I hit "pause."  The little vertical lines on the pause slide had several additional vertical "ghost" lines, to the right, in sequentially less vivid images.  I thought the problem my be due to my reception, but it did the same thing on a DVD program, so it had to be the tv.I called the LG number and spoke to a representative.  She said to unplug the tv and the antenna wire and plug it back in.  I did as she recommended, but nothing changed.  Therefore she said that's all she could do on the phone but they could contact a service rep in my area.  Supposedly the service rep would give me a call and set up an appointment to service the tv.  After three days of no contact, I called back and told the rep that I would like to return the tv.  He told me that they could not take the tv back, but that they were trying to locate a service rep in my area and would be able to do so in 3 to 5 business days.  I told him I no longer wanted a service rep, but wanted to return the tv for a full refund.  He told me that they could not take the tv back and would not refund the money.  (I've only had the tv 4 days.)I contacted Amazon.com, LLC and they agreed to take the tv back and refund my money.I appreciated the fact that LG answered the phone, but was extremely disappointed from that point on.  LG has been marked off of my good list.  I will never purchase another LG tv.  What a disappointment.  Life is Good, but it would be better if LG stood behind their product.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Nannette P. Kendall
Reviews.Content: I am so excited to have my new tv!  It arrived a day earlier than I had anticipated and was relatively easy to set up.  (My neighbors helped me!)  So far, so good!

Reviews.Title: Close call
Reviews.Author: Alex James
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for my mom in Arkansas I live in Washington, Item arrived in a timely manner But had some concern in the beginning. TV was locked on a sports channel and my mom its is challenged when it comes to tech stuff, being as how I was a couple thousand miles away I was worried. But a younger cousin came over and figured it out for her. She says the picture is clear and crisp so she is happy.

Reviews.Title: Defective Model
Reviews.Author: Kaitlin Scheffing
Reviews.Content: After a lot of time and effort spent researching TVs, we finally decided to get the LG 32" LK330. We received the TV and immediately hooked it up with great results. We sat down to watch a movie and were halfway through the movie when the TV turned off and would not turn back on. We did call LG customer service and found out that the TV was defective (go figure) and we would have to return it or have a technician come out and look at it. We decided to return it. This is the only LG product we've had a problem with, but after researching what was wrong with the TV we found that this seems to be a common problem with these TVs.

Reviews.Title: MISERABLE SOUND, AND A SQUIGGLE
Reviews.Author: sparklers "sparklers"
Reviews.Content: Bought on Black Friday.  We hate the LG TV.  Sound's clear, but SO WEAK, can't make loud enough.  And there is a constant, annoying "squiggle" sound, even when the TV's on MUTE.  How ridiculous for a good company to produce a product such as this.  Want to return it, but got rid of the box in the belief that it would be a good tv.

Reviews.Title: Quality lacking, dark picture
Reviews.Author: Amanda M. Moralis "Busy Woman"
Reviews.Content: The picture on this LG TV is dark, no matter what setting you choose for display. Speakers are on the back of the TV, making it difficult to hear the audio when TV is in a cabinet.After owning the TV for about 2 months, two wriggling white lines appeared, running vertically down the left side of the screen. After attempting (and failing) to file a warranty claim on the LG website, we wound up calling their 800# and requesting service. We scheduled a repair for the end of the week, but had to call the local repair place to confirm. When I called them, they said there was no way that day was going to be possible, as they would need to order parts.Turns out the panel (a $400 part) needed to be replaced. It took a week to come in, and once the repair place came out to fix it we discovered we needed the original receipt to get the warranty work done, which was in a wallet that was stolen the prior month.We'll be purchasing a new, non-LG TV.

Reviews.Title: TV didn't work
Reviews.Author: justin young
Reviews.Content: I got pretty mad when I bought a new conditioned TV that was actually faulty so i went on a rant. The tv worked fine for 30 minutes then turned off by itself with a loud popping static noise then turned on by itself then off. Tried to turn it back on after that, same thing. The LG repairman came and replaced my power supply which seemed to work. for 1 night. Then it wouldn't even turn on the next morning. The lg repairman came back and replaced the board which seems to have fixed it for now. I will let you guys know how it goes after that. I am new to amazon and did not know I could return this at no cost, now i know.

Reviews.Title: very poor
Reviews.Author: malik harrais
Reviews.Content: tv was missing screws also the TV piture was bed the tv was no level missing parts all types of problems with the tv i would not buy from this buyer again
